name: BTLx Feature from Parameters
description: Generates a feature from BTLx parameters.

inputParameters.name: Beam
inputParameters.description: Beam to apply BTLx feature to.

inputParameters.name: Reference Face
inputParameters.description: integer 1-6 corresponding to BTLx reference side.

outputParameters.name: Reference Face
outputParameters.description: Lines showing the X and Y axes of the reference face.
